data.title: FACETS Announces, “Giallo Gelato” Series Saturday, July 30th
data.meta_site_name: FACETS | Experience the edge of cinema.
data.text:
CHICAGO – This summer, Chicago celebrates Italian murder and local ice cream! A bottle of J&B, a sexy electro soundtrack, a generous dollop of 70’s Eurochic sleaze… and ice cream?! Benvenuti in Giallo Gelato! This summer, Chicago celebrates Italy’s Giallo films with an all-day immersion into this fascinating niche of the horror genre.

On Saturday, July 30, from 2pm to 10pm, FACETS Cinema will screen three of the sweetest hand-selected titles emblematic of the decades’ most controversial directors. Full synopsis, trailer, and ticketing can be found on FACETS’ website here. Film stills can be found in this shared folder here.

Generally characterized as murder-mystery thrillers combining the suspense elements of detective fiction with scenes of shocking violence, Gialli typically feature graphic murder scenes, stylish cinematography, and a black-gloved killer driven by sexual psychopathy. Hundreds of these films were made between 1968 through 1988, with the genre’s heyday arguably between 1970-1979.

Furthering the authentic Italian deliciousness, fans of ice cream and murder will enjoy a one-time-only Giallo-inspired gallery show from Chicago artist Corinne Halbert, as well as a custom flavor of locally-made small batch gelato thanks to Sideshow Gelato!

So slip on those black leather gloves, polish that razor blade to shiny perfection, and swing by FACETS for the most scrumptious scoops of GIALLO GELATO!

Tickets can be purchased in advance through FACETS’ website and cost $12/General and $10/FACETS Members per screening. Double feature tickets are $20/General and $17/FACETS Members with proof of active membership.

Full series description, film synopses, and trailers can be found on the Giallo Gelato series page here.

SERIES SCHEDULE

Art show by Corrine Halbert @ 2pm

Screening of THE PSYCHIC @ 3pm – complimentary screening with reservation

Sideshow Gelato sampling @ 5pm – complimentary for attendees

Screening of INVESTIGATION OF A CITIZEN ABOVE SUSPICION @ 5:30pm

Screening of YOUR VICE IS A LOCKED ROOM AND ONLY I HAVE THE KEY @ 8pm

PRESENTED BY

Stephanie Sack, the powerhouse behind Giallo Gelato, identifies as a voluptuous robot, Cosmic Hostess, gothy AF, Chicago native, hot yoga junkie, UFO valet, and total weirdo. She lives for films about murder, space, and murder in space. A self-taught Giallophile, Stephanie brandishes a giant knife in glee to be partnering with FACETS for this all-day soiree of Italian cinema! Catch her online at secretcinemaschool.com, and stay tuned for her small group film classes and even more in-person events coming soon.

THREE-SCOOP SPONSOR

The Italian Cultural Institute of Chicago is the cultural office of the Consulate General of Italy in Chicago. Founded in 1985, the Institute is one of five cultural agencies of the Italian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation in the United States. It is located in the heart of Chicago along the Magnificent Mile. The Institute serves as a convenient source for information about Italian life and culture that showcases Italy’s classic and contemporary heritage with particular reference to art, music, cinema, design, architecture, literature, fashion, theatre, cuisine, science, and technology. The Institute is also home to a school of Italian language and culture, as well as a venue for art exhibitions and film screenings. A special scoop of ice cream to the Institute’s Director, Luca Di Vito, who made Giallo Gelato possible!

TICKETING AND MORE

The screening for THE PSYCHIC is free. For INVESTIGATION and VICE, single tickets are $12/General and $10/FACETS Members and double feature tickets are $20/General and $17/FACETS Members. Tickets are available through FACETS‘ website.

Guests are invited to stop by before the screening and hangout afterwards in The Café and The Studio to browse films and enjoy curated programming related to the series. Concession items and alcoholic beverages are available for purchase.

To pre-order tickets, click here.

* * *

FACETS Memberships:

Become a FACETS Member today to receive special discounts, including up to 15% on all purchases and exclusive access to the organization’s video rental catalog of hard-to-find Blu-rays, DVDs, and VHS tapes. Sign up today at www.facets.org/members.

* * *

Health & Safety Protocols:

By purchasing a ticket to a FACETS screening, you are accepting the inherent risk of public film viewing in the midst of COVID-19. You are agreeing to not only adhere to FACETS’ COVID-19 prevention policies, but also understand that we reserve the right to refuse service in the event of non-compliance.

* * *
